version.desc: If true, print Marginalia version and exit.

summary.desc: Path of execution summary file to write.

print_summary.desc: If true, print execution summary JSON to stdout after completion.

output.desc: File path to write primary command output to.

fail.desc: Failure handling policy when errors are encountered.

json.desc: JSON formatting style for output artifacts.

path.desc: File or directory path to scan (scan command only).

files.desc: Glob pattern restricting which files are scanned (scan command only).

exclude.desc: Glob pattern for excluding files or directories (scan command only).

inventory_path.desc: Path to Marginalia inventory JSON file (index command only).
